name: Tharanesh Varadharajan
main: Tharanesh Varadharajan is currently a student in the Master of Science in Digital and Material Technologies program at the University of Michiganâ€™s Taubman College of Architecture and Urban Planning. He holds a Bachelor of Architecture degree from RV School of Architecture in India. His professional experience spans over various project types and scales. He is interested in exploring the potential of computational design methods and digital fabrication technologies to improve the built environment.
